text: Robert David Grusin (born June 26, 1934) is an American composer, arranger, producer, and pianist. He has won an Academy Award and ten Grammy Awards. He is the co-founder of GRP Records. He won an Oscar for his score of The Milagro Beanfield War (1988). ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Academy Award winning composers Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:American pianists Category:American composers Category:American jazz musicians Category:American keyboardists Category:American record producers Category:Musicians from Colorado Category:Writers from Colorado
title: Dave Grusin
